pages.text: Grants the consumer Nourishment (7 min), Water Breathing (5 min).$(br)Right-clicking an Apostle/Apostle Servant restores 10% of their max HP.

pages.title: Sauce Grilled Candy Fish
pages.text: Grants the consumer Nourishment (8 min), Blazing Aura (2 min).$(br)Right-clicking an Apostle/Apostle Servant restores 15% of their max HP.
